properties.displayName: MDE Alert - Suspicious Task Scheduler activity
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "Suspicious Task Scheduler activity"
